title: So can Tibbers get a .75 delay now?  :P
body:
Pretty much every reason to remove Veigar's also applies to Annie.

Also, can we get an option to listen to the enemies DJ Sona in case our team doesn't have one?  :D

replies.body: Veigar does not have to cast other spells to stun you. Veigar can still farm with other skills while holding his stun. Annie has an indicator for when she can stun you while Veigar just test your math skills. Veigar also has more range he can stun you from. That's 4 reasons right there.

> [{quoted}](name=TaIont,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IyOyEegR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-25T22:21:54.207+0000)
>
>Annie has an indicator for when she can stun you while Veigar just test your math skills. Veigar also has more range he can stun you from. 
 
Then how is it fair that she can stun at a larger range and hold her stun for as long as she wants when TF can only hold his stun for 6 seconds and has 100 shorter range?

> [{quoted}](name=Qazgir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IyOyEegR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-25T23:13:42.437+0000)
>
> Then how is it fair that she can stun at a larger range and hold her stun for as long as she wants when TF can only hold his stun for 6 seconds and has 100 shorter range?

annie doesnt teleport over a third of the map. TF can still farm then start up gold card whenever its off cd. Annie cant poke me from 1000 range away. This is common knowledge stuff you didn't seriously need me to list obvious facts did you? BTW TF can cycle cards for 4-5 seconds and lock in gold whenever he wants so its more like a possible 10-11 seconds he can hold this.
Annie has a animation that shows you that her stun is up,  if she is walking towards you with her stun online, she is telegraphing the Tibbers stun.

Yes she does, but she can also recharge that stun much faster than Veigar can.  The point is she still automatically stuns and explodes people with no counterplay, so it would only make sense to give someone an option other than "don't go near Annie with her passive up(which is most of the time)"

>Pretty much every reason to remove Veigar's also applies to Annie.

Veigar does significantly more damage than Annie.

To a single target, Annie can hit several people with the bulk of her combo if they're near each other.  I don't think Annie is OP or anything, but she definitely deals as much damage or more than Veigar if you consider her AoE potential.

> [{quoted}](name=Solaire,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IyOyEegR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-25T23:46:54.167+0000)
>
> To a single target, Annie can hit several people with the bulk of her combo if they're near each other.  I don't think Annie is OP or anything, but she definitely deals as much damage or more than Veigar if you consider her AoE potential.

Since when has veigar's stun not been AoE and last i checked, Annie doesn't have an ability that gets stronger the more AP your enemy has.
